an3.71:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
an3.71:1.2: Atha kho channo paribbajako yenayasma anando tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata anandena saddhim sammodi.
an3.71:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho channo paribbajako ayasmantam anandam etadavoca:
an3.71:1.4: “tumhepi, avuso ananda, ragassa pahanam pannapetha, dosassa pahanam pannapetha, mohassa pahanam pannapetha”ti.
an3.71:1.5: “Mayam kho, avuso, ragassa pahanam pannapema, dosassa pahanam pannapema, mohassa pahanam pannapema”ti.
an3.71:2.1: “Kim pana tumhe, avuso, rage adinavam disva ragassa pahanam pannapetha, kim dose adinavam disva dosassa pahanam pannapetha, kim mohe adinavam disva mohassa pahanam pannapetha”ti?
an3.71:3.1: “Ratto kho, avuso, ragena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto attabyabadhayapi ceteti, parabyabadhayapi ceteti, ubhayabyabadhayapi ceteti, cetasikampi dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti;
an3.71:3.2: rage pahine nevattabyabadhayapi ceteti, na parabyabadhayapi ceteti, na ubhayabyabadhayapi ceteti, na cetasikam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an3.71:3.3: Ratto kho, avuso, ragena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto kayena duccaritam carati, vacaya duccaritam carati, manasa duccaritam carati;
an3.71:3.4: rage pahine neva kayena duccaritam carati, na vacaya duccaritam carati, na manasa duccaritam carati.
an3.71:3.5: Ratto kho, avuso, ragena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto attatthampi yathabhutam nappajanati, paratthampi yathabhutam nappajanati, ubhayatthampi yathabhutam nappajanati;
an3.71:3.6: rage pahine attatthampi yathabhutam pajanati, paratthampi yathabhutam pajanati, ubhayatthampi yathabhutam pajanati.
an3.71:3.7: Rago kho, avuso, andhakarano acakkhukarano annanakarano pannanirodhiko vighatapakkhiko anibbanasamvattaniko.
an3.71:4.2: mulho kho, avuso, mohena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto attabyabadhayapi ceteti, parabyabadhayapi ceteti, ubhayabyabadhayapi ceteti, cetasikampi dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti;
an3.71:4.3: mohe pahine nevattabyabadhayapi ceteti, na parabyabadhayapi ceteti, na ubhayabyabadhayapi ceteti, na cetasikam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an3.71:4.4: Mulho kho, avuso, mohena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto kayena duccaritam carati, vacaya duccaritam carati, manasa duccaritam carati;
an3.71:4.5: mohe pahine neva kayena duccaritam carati, na vacaya duccaritam carati, na manasa duccaritam carati.
an3.71:4.6: Mulho kho, avuso, mohena abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto attatthampi yathabhutam nappajanati, paratthampi yathabhutam nappajanati, ubhayatthampi yathabhutam nappajanati;
an3.71:4.7: mohe pahine attatthampi yathabhutam pajanati, paratthampi yathabhutam pajanati, ubhayatthampi yathabhutam pajanati.
an3.71:4.8: Moho kho, avuso, andhakarano acakkhukarano annanakarano pannanirodhiko vighatapakkhiko anibbanasamvattaniko.
an3.71:4.9: Idam kho mayam, avuso, rage adinavam disva ragassa pahanam pannapema.
an3.71:4.10: Idam dose adinavam disva dosassa pahanam pannapema.
an3.71:4.11: Idam mohe adinavam disva mohassa pahanam pannapema”ti.
an3.71:5.1: “Atthi panavuso, maggo atthi patipada etassa ragassa dosassa mohassa pahanaya”ti?
an3.71:5.2: “Atthavuso, maggo atthi patipada etassa ragassa dosassa mohassa pahanaya”ti.
an3.71:5.3: “Katamo panavuso, maggo katama patipada etassa ragassa dosassa mohassa pahanaya”ti?
an3.71:5.6: Ayam kho, avuso, maggo ayam patipada etassa ragassa dosassa mohassa pahanaya”ti.
an3.71:5.7: “Bhaddako kho, avuso, maggo bhaddika patipada etassa ragassa dosassa mohassa pahanaya.
